RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 70000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLAMMIN GOLD followed the leader on the outside, gained in the three path on the turn, took over in the four path into upper stretch and drew away while kept to the task. LIBERTY CENTRAL was a bit reluctant to load then broke a half-step slow, settled under some urging, came under stronger encouragement in the four path on the turn, remained on his inside lead in the stretch and secured the place. COLLECTED SPECIAL showed speed then chased the pace, went around the turn in the two path, drifted out under a left-handed crop in upper stretch and weakened while able to get the show. MALIBU MARGARITA was forced out at the start and off a half-step slow, raced on the outside while ridden along, dropped from the four path to the rail early on the turn, angled back to the four path near the five-sixteenths, came five wide into upper stretch, moved in around the furlong marker, dropped further in near the sixteenth-pole and just missed the show. PRICE IS TRUTH broke in but was corrected very quickly by the rider then hustled to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, rounded the turn in the two path, was asked outside the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage to the winner into upper stretch and tired. SAVAGE SPIRIT was fractious coming onto the track for post parade then also reluctant to load, dropped to the rear, traveled around the turn in the two path and was no factor. SORORITY PRANK dropped back off the pace, climbed into the kickback while moving out around the nine-sixteenths, went three wide on the turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Collected Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,chased,mvd out,2path turn,drift out 3/16,earned 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Sorority Prank
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,mvd out 4-1/2,climbed,3path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Slammin Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: followed leader outside,gained 3p turn,lead4p3/16,clr,kept task

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Central
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit reluctant to load,off 1/2 step slow,4p turn,left lead,earn2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Price Is Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,corrected,hstld,clr pace,2p turn,ask5/16,headed3/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Savage Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious post parade,reluctant to load,at rear,2p,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Margarita
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out brk,off 1/2 step slow,out,mvd in7/16,4w5/16,5w,miss3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 2 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 35000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LORD GATLING coaxed from the gate, raced four then three wide into the first turn showing the way, tucked to the two path midway, settled in hand just off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside at the nine-sixteenths when HANG TIGHT advanced and placed that rival in tight encouraging him to back off, remained along the inside through the far turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to prevail. HANG TIGHT chased along the inside, was given some rein to work with and advanced along an open rail to latch on the leader near the nine-sixteenths, had that rival come inwards and was forced to briefly steady when put in tight at that station losing about two lengths of position and ground, came under coaxing along the inside at the three-eighths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. GRUMPS LITTLE TOTS coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. GOLDINI hustled from the start, chased two to three wide coaxed along from three furlongs out, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. DATESFREEDOM four then three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, tipped four wide for home, weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Goldini
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez, Rudy R. and Imperio, Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Grumps Little Tots
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Datesfreedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w 1st turn, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, brief steady in tight 9/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Gatling
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 4-3w into1st trn, in hand 2p, to ins 9/16, 2w 1/4,safe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANGELAS PARTY GIRL went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, dictated terms in the two path on the turn, extended the advantage coming to the quarter-pole, responded well when shaken up in upper stretch, drew off under one tap of the crop into the final furlong and proved much the best under a strong hand-ride to the finish. JUST A NYQUIST settled off the pace, was urged between foes in the two path early on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and safely secured the place. ACCEL ROSE tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, dropped back coming to the quarter-pole and tired while best of the rest. SWEET AS SUGAR settled off the pace, was urged along inside foes while along the rail early on the turn, dropped back near the three-eighths pole, shifted to the three path in the vicinity of the five-sixteenths and came up empty. SIMPLE SUGAR settled off the pace, was urged between rivals in the three path early on the turn, remained on her inside lead in the stretch and capitulated. SYNONYMOUS dropped back quickly while showing no speed, was urged at the rear, went three wide on the turn and was no factor. LUNA LOCA was hustled from the gate, settled on the outside, dropped back four wide on the turn, remained on her inside lead in the stretch and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged ins-3path turn, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Nyquist
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 2path btwn foes turn,safely secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Synonymous
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed,drop back,urged at rear,3wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Accel Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, chased 3path turn, dropped back1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, between 7/16, urged 3path turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Loca
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo God's Glory Stables and Arenas Cristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled outside,dropped back 4w turn,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Angelas Party Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,dictated terms 2p turn,drew off,strong urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LET IT RIDE two to three wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, drew clear under a drive and was geared down inside the final sixteenth to the finish. JUST CALL RAY coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while offering up a mild kick. FORCED RANKING showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing under challenge just off the inside at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, yielded the front near the three-sixteenths and weakened to the finish. LEDDY coaxed from the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and improved position to secure the last major share. BEZOS chased just off the inside early on, tipped to the five path with nine-sixteenths to go, continued five wide through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and tired. REGISTER chased along the inside, balked in a little tight along the fence with six furlongs to go flinching slightly from the rail, came under coaxing still along the inside at the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and tired. LAFITTE'S FLEET grew unsettled in the gate and was backed out and reloaded, chased three to four paths off the inside until tucked to the inside at the nine-sixteenths, chased just off the inside through the turn and then three wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Bezos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p early, tip 5w 9/16, coaxed 5w 3/8, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Register
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, balked ins 3/4p, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Forced Ranking
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lafitte's Fleet
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R Speranza Steven and GRC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, to ins 9/16, 2p turn, 3w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Let It Ride
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w in aim, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, drew clear, geared down

ENTRY.NAME: Just Call Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, no match, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Leddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 85000. (UP TO $14,790 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race wil l be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DYNAMIC PRICING (IRE) was taken in hand early, saved ground on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace, came under urging with three furlongs to run, went around the far turn in the two path, moved out in upper stretch, chased the runner-up while swapping leads back and forth in the drive and surged late to get up in the final stride. WAY TO BE MARIE tracked the pace on the outside in the two path, made a bid with three furlongs to run, took the lead coming to the quarter-pole, shook clear outside the furlong marker, led until the final stride but was denied. KATHERINE THOMAS settled on the inside, was asked on the final turn, turned into the stretch in the two path and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. JUST JULES went to the front, showed the way on the inside with a clear advantage, was asked under threat on the far turn, lost the lead approaching the quarter-pole, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. JUST MUSIC bumped with a rival at the start, went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked in the two path on the far turn, spun three wide into the stretch and failed to rally. HOLLYWOOD DREAM was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, saved ground towards the rear and failed to threaten. DAY AWAY saved ground on the first turn, settled off the pace, went two then three wide on the far turn and failed to respond. STYLE POINTS broke in at the start, raced in the two path on the first turn, settled off the pace, was urged along passing the five-eighths, traveled around the far turn in the two path and also failed to respond. PUBLIC ASSEMBLY was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, went three wide on the turns and never reached contention. Z TRAIN (IRE) rounded the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, saved ground on the far turn and also was no factor. CHANNEL LOOP bumped with a rival at the start, saved ground at the rear, moved off the rail late on the far turn and showed little. THAT'STHEFACTJACK went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, traveled three then four wide on the far turn, dropped back five wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Hollywood Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,towards rear,saved ground,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamic Pricing (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,well placed ins-2p,ask3/8,mvd out3/16,chased,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Just Jules
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,clear,ask2nd turn,headed1/4,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Way to Be Marie
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPenta Robert V and Madaket Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,tracked out,bid3/8,2p2nd,led1/4-1/16,denied final stride

ENTRY.NAME: Day Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,settled,2-3p2nd turn,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Katherine Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,ask2nd turn,2p1/4,lacked needed response,best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Public Assembly
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,3w1st,near back,roused 3w2nd,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Style Points
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,2p1st,settled,urged5/8,2p2nd turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Z Train (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st turn,towards rear,ins2nd turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Just Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3w1st,settled outside,ask2p2nd turn,3w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Loop
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,saved ground,2path near 5/16,showed little

ENTRY.NAME: That'sthefactjack
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,settled outside,3-4w2nd turn,5w1/4,faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Atlantic Beach S. AQUEDUCT RACE 6 6F Outer turf CR: 97. Stakes Purse 120000. OUTER TURF FOR TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $120 each which should accompany the nomination; $600 to pass the entry box and an additional $600 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $600 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% t o fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, October 21, 2023 with 19 Original Nominations and 3 Supplements. (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLEASE ADVISE chased just off the inside from near the rear of the field, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, rallied along the inside behind the leader through to the sixteenth marker, tipped out just inside that station forcing SPLIT STRIKE to pause and brush APOLLO TEN, then surged late to get up in the final jumps to the wire. IRISH GENT (IRE) coaxed from the gate, chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, closed well outside and missed at the end getting up for the place honors. WORKS FOR ME broke in at the start trading a bump with GET SPOOLED who broke outwards, cut the pace under pressure from a pair while along the inside, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive inching away to the eighth pole, then got caught in the final jumps by a pair and was forced to settle for the show honors. APOLLO TEN chased three wide until tucked inside through the turn, got set down angled three wide into upper stretch, got brushed just inside the sixteenth marker and offered up a mild bid. SPLIT STRIKE prompted the pace just off the inside between foes coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive prominent to inside the eighth pole, began to back away when forced to pause and brush with APOLLO TEN just inside the sixteenth marker as the eventual winner tipped off the inside, then continued to weaken in the late going. GET SPOOLED broke out at the start trading a bump with WORKS FOR ME, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and offered no response. RUDDY BUDDY coaxed from the gate, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and weakened. DILGER (IRE) broke a beat slow and got taken in hand when he lost his lane to a pair of rivals who broke towards one another exchanging a bump directly in front, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. WOKE UP QUICK hustled from the gate, prompted the pace outside a pair four then three wide coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, tipped four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Get Spooled
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Dilger (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, steady st, chased 3-2w, 5-6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Works for Me
ENTRY.OWNER: KatieRich Stables LLC Connors Christopher G and Appel Lawrence J
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, cut pressured pace ins, ins 1/4, dug in, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Split Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 2p betw foes, 2w 1/4p, paused 1/16p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Woke Up Quick
ENTRY.OWNER: Perrine Time Thoroughbreds and Blue Streak Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, prompted 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Please Advise
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, ins turn, ins 1/4, tip 2p ins 1/16, late surge, up

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Gent (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 8w upper, closed well, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Apollo Ten
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w backstretch, to ins 7/16, set down 3w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ruddy Buddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 2p 5/16, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 86. Maiden Special Weight Purse 85000. (UP TO $14,790 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIERRA LEONE bobbled after the start, settled off the pace, was roused three wide on the turn, came five wide into upper stretch, chased outside into the final furlong, gained to make a bid outside the sixteenth-pole and got up while kept off two foes late to prevail. CHANGE OF COMMAND broke in at the start, moved up to get the lead, showed the way with some company to his outside, vied inside to the two path on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, came under a right-handed crop in upper stretch, drifted out in the final furlong and was overtaken then just held the place. IGNITE THE LIGHT prompted the pace on the outside, was urged in the three path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under the crop, was carried out in the final furlong and outfinished then just missed the place while able to get the show. TUSCAN GOLD bumped with the hindquarters of a foe at the start then was taken up, settled on the outside, was urged five then four wide on the turn, chased the leader in the stretch and was out-kicked. HUNT BALL was rated off the pace, drafted in the two path on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, chased under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. DEPOSITION stumbled at the start, moved up near the five-eighths pole, dropped back under urging while inside on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and failed to respond. RIDGEWOOD RUNNER was bumped in the hindquarters at the start, skipped over a small dark object on the track near the seven-eighths pole, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the four path on the turn, dropped back at the five-sixteenths, spun six wide into upper stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Change of Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,to front,pace,ins-2p,ask1/4,drift out last 1/8,overtaken

ENTRY.NAME: Deposition
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,mvd up 5/8,drop back rail turn,mvd out,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Hunt Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated,drafted 2path turn,asked1/4,chased,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ignite the Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted outside,urged 3path turn,crop into lane,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Leone
ENTRY.OWNER: Magnier Mrs John Tabor Michael B Smith Derrick Westerberg Rocket Ship Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled after brk,settled,ask 3w turn,5w3/16,rallied,up last1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Tuscan Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H Walmac Farm and Stonestreet Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tkn up,settled,5-4path turn,chased,out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgewood Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,skipped over object7/8,out,4w turn,6w3/16,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. T hree Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim OtherwiseC laim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKER'S CANDY dueled early on from the four path with the runner up to his inside, eased off that foe when THRILL OF IT advanced inside and tracked that pair into the far turn, advanced tucked three wide at the three-eighths, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung six wide into upper stretch, seized command at the three-sixteenths and drew clear under a drive to prevail. PRINCE OF PHAROAHS dueled from the two path with MAKER'S CANDY through to the five-eighths when that rival backed off and was confronted by THRILL OF IT to his inside, knocked heads with that rival through the turn and had the aforementioned advance once more three furlongs out and took back narrow command between foes, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch under threat, yielded the front with three-sixteenths to run, dug in under a drive and held for the place honors over a late running rival. COLLOQUY hustled from the gate, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and kept on to miss for the place honors. BOSSMAKINBOSSMOVES four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to the finish. THRILL OF IT coaxed from the gate, raced along the inside early on before advancing to duel with PRONCE OF PHAROAHS from the five furlong marker, knocked heads through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. MASON MANIA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing half a mile from home, angled five wide into upper stretch and tired. WILD BANKER two to three wide in pursuit, got coaxed along three furlongs from home, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Thrill of It
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, advanced 5/8, dueled turn, 2w 1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Pharoahs
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Morrison Matthew J and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2x 2p, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, dug in, held second

ENTRY.OWNER: Murray Robert E and Lyden Michael P
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Mason Mania
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 1/2, angled 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Maker's Candy
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Maxis Stable and Huber John
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 4p, eased off 5/8, bid 3w 3/8, 6w uppr, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bossmakinbossmoves
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable and Mitre Box Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Stewart Manor S. AQUEDUCT RACE 9 6F Outer turf CR: 86. Stakes Purse 120000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $120 each which should accompany the nomination; $600 to pass the entry box and an additional $600 to st art. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $600 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to four th, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning ow ner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, October 21, 2023 with 28 Nominations. (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOUPIE left the gate in good order, was rated just off the pace, came under a vigorous hold while just behind the leader from the nine-sixteenths into the turn, drafted along the rail on that bend, was shuffled back some behind the tiring pacesetter near the five-sixteenths, moved to the two path outside the quarter-pole, angled out while put to a drive in upper stretch, remained on her inside lead until just before the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead, closed well to get the advantage near the sixteenth-pole then moved clear under steady handling. MARCO T. brushed the outside of the gate at the start, settled off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch, moved in while gaining in the final furlong and finished with good energy for the place. GREAVETTE stalked the pace, made a bid with a half-mile to run, took the lead in the three path at the three-eighths pole, dropped to the two path later on that bend, responded well when asked for his best in upper stretch, was collared by the winner near the sixteenth-pole and weakened but just held the show. SHOP LIFTING came outward at the start, settled off the pace, moved from the rail to the three path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and improved to just miss the show. EVER SO SWEET (IRE) was forwardly placed on the far outside, went four wide while asked on the turn, came five wide into the stretch, chased into the final furlong and weakened. CAMILA T (IRE) was rated just off the pace, came under urging while two then three wide on the turn and lacked the needed kick. GRAM settled off the pace, raced in the two path on the turn, was taken in hand inside the three-eighths pole, dropped to the rail late on the bend, moved out while asked for her best in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. SHE'S FIRE settled at the rear, went two then three wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and was no factor. NICKY JOLENE was urged along towards the front, chased three wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and came up empty. ROSIE JEEKS settled towards the rear, went two then three wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. LOVE TO EAT was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, was urged inside on the turn, lost the lead at the three-eighths pole, dropped back near the five-sixteenths and capitulated.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: AQUEDUCT RACE 10 1 1/16M Turf CR: 80. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATLANTA'S ACUNA forwardly placed just off the inside through the first turn, tracked the leader in closest aim four then three wide, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive latched on the leader through the final eighth and was up in the last jumps to the wire. PRINCE OF TROY established the front crossing to show the way along the inside through the first turn and then just off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside through the far turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat through to the finish and was caught in the final strides. BARRY THE BUILDER got bumped at the start by TONY O, raced just off the inside through the first turn before chasing four then three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide for home and offered up a mild kick. YOUR MISSION saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and closed well to the finish. JOINT RESOLUTION chased just off the inside patiently handled until let out continuing just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick but was outfinished in the late stages. WAFLR chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive keeping on to the finish but was outkicked. TONY O broke in at the start bumping BARRY THE BUILDER, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. HE'S A LUCKY GUY bobbled when in tight out of the chute with a mile to run and clipped the back of PERFECT OUTCOME, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. PERFECT OUTCOME got clipped behind by the aforementioned foe when put in tight out of the chute one mile from home, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. BERNARDINO just off the inside through the first turn, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. MYLES three then two wide through the first turn, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled seven wide into upper stretch and tired. LOOKIN' TO WIN chased along the inside coming under coaxing with five-sixteenths to go, cut the corner into upper stretch, tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Lookin' to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, dug in, kept on, outkicked
